trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> exception block of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_try/catch" name="try/catch" href=""></xref> statement.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>例外狀況區塊<xref uid="langword_csharp_try/catch" name="try/catch" href=""></xref>陳述式。

trans-unit.source: CodeCatchClause can be used to represent a `catch` exception block of a `try/catch` statement.
trans-unit.target: CodeCatchClause 無法用來代表`catch`例外狀況區塊`try/catch`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.CatchExceptionType%2A> property specifies the type of exception to catch.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.CatchExceptionType%2A>屬性指定之攔截的例外狀況類型。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.CatchExceptionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.LocalName%2A> property specifies a name for the variable representing the exception that has been caught.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.LocalName%2A>屬性會指定代表已攔截到例外狀況變數的名稱。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.LocalName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.Statements%2A> collection property contains the statements for the `catch` block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.Statements%2A>集合屬性包含的陳述式`catch`區塊。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause.Statements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> class using the specified local variable name for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref>類別使用例外狀況指定的本機變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況，catch 子句中宣告本機變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is optional.
trans-unit.target: 這是選用的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> class using the specified local variable name for the exception and exception type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref>類別使用的例外狀況和例外狀況類型的指定本機變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況，catch 子句中宣告本機變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is optional.
trans-unit.target: 這是選用的選項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the type of exception to catch.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"> </xref>指出攔截的例外狀況的類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref> class using the specified local variable name for the exception, exception type and statement collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause"></xref>類別使用指定的本機變數名稱的例外狀況，例外狀況型別和陳述式集合。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local variable declared in the catch clause for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況，catch 子句中宣告本機變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is optional.
trans-unit.target: 這是選用的選項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the type of exception to catch.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"> </xref>指出攔截的例外狀況的類型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> objects that represent the contents of the catch block.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> catch 區塊的內容所表示的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the exception to handle with the catch block.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與 catch 區塊中處理例外狀況的類型。

trans-unit.source: If a value for this property is not specified, the value of this property defaults to <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此屬性的值，這個屬性的值會預設為<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the type of the exception to handle.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"> </xref> ，表示要處理的例外狀況的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the variable name of the exception that the <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> clause handles.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定例外狀況的變數名稱<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>子句控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the name of the local variable for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定本機變數的名稱，例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This local variable is optional.
trans-unit.target: 這個本機變數是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: By default, the clause does not have this variable.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，在子句沒有這個變數。

trans-unit.source: The name for the exception variable that the <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> clause handles.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況變數的名稱， <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref>子句控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the statements within the catch block.
trans-unit.target: 取得在 catch 區塊內的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"></xref> containing the statements within the catch block.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection"> </xref>包含 catch 區塊內的陳述式。
